item.title: Fukoo Kindergarten - Old House Adventure | Game Introduction
item.author: jiunjiun69
item.description: Fukoo Kindergarten - Old House Adventure -- Fukoo Kindergarten - Old House Adventure 🎮 Introduction Fukoo Kindergarten - Old House Adventure is an adventure game based on the theme of old houses around Fukoo Kindergarten. Children can explore these old houses through the game and learn about their history and culture. The game is full of puzzles and challenges, and children need to solve difficult problems, find hidden props, complete tasks, and explore every corner.
